TopicTitle: 100 ways to get kicked out of wallmart

Articles.Content:
690:

Summon a hungry bear in the meat section.

689:

A joke that Hongkongers understand
691: do a 1337 noscope on the manager

693: Bring in a massive reclined lawn chair. Place it in front of the doors inside, blocking the doors, and lay down, dramatically commenting on the heat (or lackthereof). For added effect, wear sunglasses, even if it's cold outside. Stare menacingly at people as they enter/exit. When someone finally asks you to leave, simply explain you're trying to get out of the (heat/cold, whichever is the INVERSE of what it is outside, so if it's hot out, say it's "oh so terribly chilly").

As you leave, mutter (but not so quiet no one can hear), "I should have done this at (insert nearby competitor shop)."

694: Play Counter-Strike loudly on the TVs.

*loud gunshots*

THE BOMB HAS BEEN PLANTED!
hide behind the cans, until after it closes, and scare the re-stockers. and knock off all the cans.
#696: Lie down on a shelf, hidden behind whatever's on the shelf, and scream whenever someone walks by. (If they move whatever's hiding you, yell "They're coming for me!!!")
